description: Retrieves detailed metadata for an AWS Marketplace listing, including pricing, fulfillment, and entitlement options used by Bedrock.

unverifiedMitreAttackTechniques.reason: Listing details reveal which IAM roles or marketplace entitlements are required, helping attackers plan privilege escalation.
Information about usage terms per account can indicate which AWS accounts already have access to specific Bedrock models.

incidents.description: AI-assisted cloud intrusion achieves admin access in 8 minutes

securityImplications: Attackers might use GetListingView to learn which commercial Bedrock providers are available, their cost controls, and what entitlements must be abused to spin up expensive inference jobs.
